message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000.  I believe this is a fair starting point for a mutually beneficial deal.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $900,000 is a bit too low for me to consider.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $930,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of this product and allows us both to walk away happy.
I understand that you're looking to make a profit, but $920,000 is my maximum offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay $920,000 for the product.
